body:
@mattfarina 
> this could kill talks to bring in common methods to handle packages because we have this

Personally I don't think that is the case. This proposal enables one kind of refactoring -- moving things around -- there still needs to be a separate discussion and proposal to handle breaking changes (e.g. altering a function signature). 

This proposal also provides a mechanism to separate internals while surfacing only what's needed in the API -- not something that versioning can achieve. I'm a bit concerned about cognitive overhead and having to dig down through multiple aliases, but I have no doubt that vendor discussions will continue.
